mapper.select: SELECT postReplyID,postreply.`userID`,userName,postTitle,postReplyContent,postReplyTime FROM postreply JOIN user ON postreply.`userID` = user.`userID` JOIN post ON postreply.`postID` = post.`postID` WHERE postreply.`postID` = ${postID} ORDER BY postReplyTime LIMIT 1
